Docs.summary: Splits words into subwords and performs optional transformations on subword groups. This token filter is implemented using Apache Lucene.

Docs.param: The name of the token filter. It must only contain letters, digits, spaces, dashes or underscores, can only start and end with alphanumeric characters, and is limited to 128 characters.

Docs.summary: A value indicating whether all subword parts will be catenated. For example, if this is set to true, "Azure-Search-1" becomes "AzureSearch1". Default is false.
